statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 4 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 4 \\ 1 \\ 5 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 11 \\ -18 \\ -2 \\ -8 \\ -23 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 4 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 4 \\ 1 \\ 5 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 11 \\ -18 \\ -2 \\ -8 \\ -23 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
